author: Ash ketchum
message: My Poke Balls just arrived and I can't wait to go catch more Pokémon with them!!

author: Wataru Lance
message: Buying stuff for my Pokémon without having to leave my house is just GREAT

author: Nurse Joy
message: This new modern version of the Poké Mart makes everything easier for us here in the Pokémon Center. Thank u guys!

author: Takeshi Brock
message: Every time I order from you it arrives in a matter of minutes! That may be cos I live next to one of the Poké Marts tho
